name: VotingContract

methods.name: optInToApplication
methods.desc:
Allow users to opt-in to the application
This is required before users can interact with the contract

methods.name: checkPollActive
methods.desc: Check if poll is currently active and not expired

methods.name: endPoll
methods.desc: End the poll (only creator can call)

methods.name: checkHasVoted
methods.desc: Check if current user has voted

methods.name: getMyVote
methods.desc: Get the option the current user voted for

desc:
Voting Contract - Decentralized voting on Algorand
Features: One active poll at a time, one-vote-per-wallet, transparent results, time-bounded polls

sourceInfo.errorMessage: OnCompletion must be NoOp && can only call when creating
OnCompletion must be OptIn && can only call when not creating

invalid number of bytes for arc4.uint64
